issue.title: [Packaging][deb][RPM] Upload artifacts patterns are wrong
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18103](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18103). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It may upload artifacts that have the same base name. It causes 422 HTTP response from GitHub. Because GitHub's upload artifact API returns 422 if the base name already exists in the release.

https://app.travis-ci.com/github/ursacomputing/crossbow/builds/256830240

```

curl: (22) The requested URL returned error: 422 
```
